required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Fixed Combination of Beclomethasone Dipropionate (BDP) + Formoterol Fumarate (FF) + Glycopyrronium Bromide (GB) (CHF 5993)Administered Via Dry Powder Inhaler (DPI) in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II, Multicentre, Randomised, Double-blind, Double-dummy, Active-controlled, 3-way Cross-over Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of CHF 5993 Administered Via Dry Powder Inhaler (DPI) Versus CHF 5993 Via Pressurized Metered Dose Inhaler (pMDI) and CHF 1535 pMDI in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of Fixed Combination of Beclomethasone Dipropionate + Formoterol Fumarate + Glycopyrronium Bromide Administered Via Dry Powder Inhaler in COPD

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: FEV1 AUC0-12h (Area Under the Curve for Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second measured serially for 0-12 hours) normalised by time (L) on dosing Day 28
primary_outcome.description: To demonstrate the non-inferiority between CHF 5993 DPI and CHF 5993 pMDI in terms of FEV1 AUC0-12h normalized by time, in COPD patients

primary_outcome.measure: Trough FEV1 at 24 hours (L) on dosing Day 28.
primary_outcome.description: To demonstrate the non-inferiority between CHF 5993 DPI and CHF 5993 pMDI in terms of trough FEV1 at 24h on dosing Day 28 in COPD patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pre-dose morning FEV1 (L) on Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the efficacy of CHF 5993 DPI on other lung function parameters and clinical outcome measures.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in FEV1 AUC0-4h normalised by time (L) on Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the efficacy of CHF 5993 DPI on other lung function parameters and clinical outcome measures.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in FEV1 AUC0-12h normalised by time (L) on Day 1
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the efficacy of CHF 5993 DPI on other lung function parameters and clinical outcome measures.

intervention.description: CHF 5993 pMDI matched Placebo (direct blinding of active CHF 5993 and CHF 1535 pMDIs)

overall_official.affiliation: Institut fuer Atemwegsforschung GmbH, Wiesbaden, Germany

link.description: Study Record on EU Clinical Trials Register including results

results_reference.citation: Beeh KM, Kuna P, Corradi M, Viaud I, Guasconi A, Georges G. Comparison of Dry-Powder Inhaler and Pressurized Metered-Dose Inhaler Formulations of Extrafine Beclomethasone Dipropionate/Formoterol Fumarate/Glycopyrronium in Patients with COPD: The TRI-D Randomized Controlled Trial. Int J Chron Obstruct Pulmon Dis. 2021 Jan 14;16:79-89. doi: 10.2147/COPD.S291030. eCollection 2021.

patient_data.ipd_description: Chiesi commits to sharing with qualified scientific and medical Researchers, conducting legitimate research, Patient-level Data, Study-level Data, the Clinical Protocol and the full CSR, providing access to clinical trial information consistently with the principle of safeguarding commercially confidential information and patient privacy. Any shared Patient-level Data is anonymized to protect personally identifiable information. Chiesi access criteria and complete process for clinical data sharing is available on the Chiesi Group website.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Chiesi access criteria and complete process for clinical data sharing is available on the Chiesi Group website.
